timeline:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/Pp6SUg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ongoing Changes\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The ongoing changes process lasts all year long and during this process managers work on a monthly basis. The main reasons for ongoing changes are hiring new employees, personal achievements of the existing employees, retention of key employees, and others. The process has an approval workflow, each ongoing change must be approved by the upper management, which is always the final step of its workflow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/d8mbUQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annual Campaign\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annual Compensation campaign is EPAM’s annual review process of employees’ compensation according to their overall performance, achievements, and extra mile activities. This process usually takes place from January to April. Compensation campaign changes have a specific timeline and an approval workflow. All changes made during the annual campaign must be approved by the CEO, which is always the final step of its workflow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Management role in the Compensation
